classes.name: 423438--Control the temperature using the radiator dial to the left of the bed
423438--Open the bedroom door that leads to the hallway
423438--Open the bottom drawer of the cabinet to the right of the bed with the lamp on top
423438--Open the bottom drawer of the cabinet with the TV on top
423438--Open the left drawer of the white cabinet to the left of the wooden cabinet
423438--Open the right drawer of the white cabinet to the left of the wooden cabinet
423438--Open the second drawer of the cabinet to the left of the bed
423438--Open the second drawer of the cabinet to the right of the bed with the lamp on top
423438--Open the second drawer of the cabinet with the TV on top
423438--Open the third drawer of the cabinet with the TV on top
423438--Open the top drawer of the cabinet to the left of the bed
423438--Open the top drawer of the cabinet to the right of the bed with the lamp on top
423438--Open the top drawer of the cabinet with the TV on top
423438--Plug the device in one of the sockets between the cabinets
423438--Unplug the TV screen from the power supply
